summary: Remove the sound you hear when discovering new locations.
descriptionHtml:
If you're looking for a SSE version, I recommend this: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1357/?]Silence of Skyrim
[/url]

Whenever you discover a new location or town a loud sound of a drum (of some sort)
will play and sometimes it feels like a jumpscare, which I don't care for.
I couldn't find any mod with this function so I decided to do it myself.
This mod is simple and only replaces some soundfiles with silent files.

[b]Following files are edited:[/b]

Install_Directory/Data/Music

- MUS_Discover_GenericLocation_01.wav
- MUS_Discover_GenericLocation_02.wav
- MUS_Discover_GenericLocation_03.wav

Install_Directory/Data/Music/Dread

- MUS_Discover_Dread_01.wav
- MUS_Discover_Dread_02.wav
- MUS_Discover_Dread_03.wav
- MUS_Discover_Dread_04.wav

Install_Directory/Data/Music/Town

- MUS_Village_01.wav
- MUS_Village_02.wav
- MUS_Village_03.wav


Compatibility: Everything, expect for a mod that changes these files.

Other recommendations:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15034/?/]Skyrim User Interface Silencer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16907/?/]Icebreakers Improved Reverb[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1632/?/]Skyrim Laugh Track Mod [/url]


Let me know if anything is not how it's supposed to be and I'll try to help.
Have fun <3
author: Apocryphall
